entry.title: WIND WARNING , Claresholm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 12:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 37 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: SW 29 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas late this evening and overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
